SELECT p.photo_num num,p.title title,p.content content,p.love love,p.singo singo,p.regdate regdate,h.id id,m.name name,pro.save_name save_name FROM member m JOIN hompy h ON h.id=m.id JOIN (SELECT * from ( SELECT hompy_num,save_name from profile order by hompy_num, regdate desc ) a group by a.hompy_num) pro ON h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num JOIN photo_folder pf ON pf.hompy_num = h.hompy_num JOIN photo p ON pf.photo_folder_num = p.photo_folder_num where p.secret='전체공개' union SELECT d.diary_num num,d.title title,d.content content,d.love love,d.singo singo,d.regdate regdate,h.id id,m.name name,pro.save_name save_name FROM member m JOIN hompy h ON h.id=m.id JOIN (SELECT * from ( SELECT hompy_num,save_name from profile order by hompy_num, regdate desc ) a group by a.hompy_num) pro ON h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num JOIN diary_folder df ON df.hompy_num = h.hompy_num JOIN diary d ON df.diary_folder_num = d.diary_folder_num where d.type='전체공개'
ORDER BY regdate desc;
SELECT pro.save_name save_name FROM hompy h JOIN profile pro ON h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num WHERE id=#{value} order by regdate desc limit 0,1
